name: DERP
description: DERP is a meme token on Solana inspired by the early 2010s era of rage comics and classic internet culture. Built around the recognizable “derp” character, it serves as a digital tribute to one of the internet’s most iconic meme styles. The project aims to preserve and celebrate this nostalgic culture through a token that is fast, low-cost to trade, and accessible to anyone within the Solana ecosystem. It is community-driven, with open participation encouraged across social channels and meme-based activities.
